org.aerogear.android.authentication

Interface Authenticator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAuthenticator

    public interface Authenticator
    This is a factory and manager for AuthenticationModule It allows you to add and remove authentication modules.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthenticationModule add(String name, AuthenticationModule authModule)
      Creates a new AuthenticationModule
      AddAuthBuilder<? extends AuthenticationModule> auth(AuthType authType, URL baseURL)
      Creates a builder to add an AuthenticationModule to the system.
      AuthenticationModule get(String name)
      Looks up and returns the AuthenticationModule if it exists.
      AuthenticationModule remove(String name)
      Looks up and removes the AuthenticationModule if it exists.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        AuthenticationModule add(String name,
                       AuthenticationModule authModule)
        Creates a new AuthenticationModule
        Parameters:
        name - a key to use to lookup the Module later
        authModule - a configured module to add to the Authenticator
        Returns:

      • get

        AuthenticationModule get(String name)
        Looks up and returns the AuthenticationModule if it exists. If name isn't valid, return null.
        Parameters:
        name - name of AuthorizationModule object
        Returns:

      • remove

        AuthenticationModule remove(String name)
        Looks up and removes the AuthenticationModule if it exists.
        Parameters:
        name - name of AuthorizationModule object
        Returns:
        the AuthenticationModule which was removed; null if one was not found

      • auth

        AddAuthBuilder<? extends AuthenticationModule> auth(AuthType authType,
                                                  URL baseURL)
        Creates a builder to add an AuthenticationModule to the system. Eventually users will be able to add their own AuthTypes, but for now we will restrict them using na Enum
        Parameters:
        authType -
        baseURL - the base url of a AuthenticationModule
        Returns:
